about.title: About me
about.intro1: With a background in media design and an eye for structure and aesthetics, I develop web applications that are technically sound and visually clear.
about.intro2: I love the combination of code and design: clean HTML/CSS, performant Angular architectures, and a UI that feels intuitive and cohesive for users.
about.intro3: What drives me is the idea of turning complexity into simple and elegant solutions.
slogans: “Clean code isn't a luxury – it's a responsibility.”
“Frontend is more than tech – it’s user relationship.”
“Frontend isn't a click-goal – it’s a system interface.”
“The user doesn’t see it. But the next developer will.”
“My stack? HTML, CSS, TypeScript – and a pinch of intuition.”
“Data flows, layouts follow – the rest is focus.”
